casebody.data:
COMMUNITY GARAGE, INC., Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
AUTO-OWNERS INSURANCE COMPANY, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 158170
COA: 339300 Supreme Court of Michigan. August 29, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellee to extend the time for filing an answer to the application for leave to appeal is GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filing if submitted on or before September 11, 2018.
